title: "Venture Catalysts plans to invest ₹1,000 crore in 150 start-ups next year"
excerpt: "Early-stage start-up investor Venture Catalysts said it has plans to invest around ₹1,000 crore in about 150 start-ups in 2021. The company has made investments in 102 Indian start-ups this calendar year."
